title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 272-3.3 - Means of disclosure of availability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 272-3.3 - Means of disclosure of availability

State Regulations
A prominent and conspicuous sign reading "Small

Quantities of Prepackaged Fresh Fruits and Vegetables are Available upon

Request" shall be located in the prepackaged fresh fruit and vegetable area and
such sign shall be posted in clear view not more than 30 feet from any point
within such area. The lettering on the aforesaid sign or signs shall not be
less than one-inch type. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
272-3.3

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
